name: motionlabs-i18n
description: An i18n extension for Motionlabs projects to streamline the translation workflow.

motionlabs-i18n.translationFilePath.description: The glob pattern to find the translation file (e.g., 'src/locales/translations.json').

motionlabs-i18n.translationFileStructure.description: The structure of the translation file. 'keysFirst': { "key": { "ko": "..." } }, 'languageFirst': { "ko": { "key": "..." } }
